channel.title: DNS problem for no-ip
channel.description:
pk-heaven.no-ip.info: DNS is current, no update needed.
i think thats fine (my duc) but i go to dynamic dns from my speedtouch router with my ip.. and it says this...
Use DynDNS: No
how to set it yes?
ynamic DNS can be used to point a fixed host name (e.g host.a-domain.com) to the public (or WAN) IP address assigned by your Internet Service Provider (typically a dynamic IP address). This allows servers located on your Local Network (configured using Game & Application Sharing) to be accessible using this alias rather than the IP address assigned by your Internet Service Provider.
that is probably the problem why my no-ip doesnt work so nobody can connect :( any help?

also try this site. all u have to do is click on what type of router u have.
http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm[/quote]

stfu code self a server a become admin.

ynamic DNS can be used to point a fixed host name (e.g host.a-domain.com) to the public (or WAN) IP address assigned by your Internet Service Provider (typically a dynamic IP address). This allows servers located on your Local Network (configured using Game & Application Sharing) to be accessible using this alias rather than the IP address assigned by your Internet Service Provider.
